backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or content.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend tasks, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of multiple frontend files including App.tsx and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining colors, radius, and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint containing root div, SEO meta tags, and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with hero slider, service cards, dynamic bottom description section, map embed, and utility components.
frontend/src/components/BusinessHighligh: Component rendering four clickable business info items with icons and links for maps, call, and WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/MobileCareSmartU: Section listing 25 mobile care tips with show‑more toggle and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppQuickMes: Popover component offering preset WhatsApp messages with generated wa.me links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity auth, wrapping AuthClient creation, login, logout, and exposing identity and login status.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including light/dark color tokens, global typography, and utility classes like background textures.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, initializing React Query and wrapping the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, requirements, design notes, known issues, and version metadata for the Gadget Zone website.
